pages.text: Lilith, the mother of vampires, is a master of blood magic. Her presence alone weakens mortals.

pages.title: Abilities
pages.text: - Blood Moon Curse: Vampires enter frenzy, mortals suffer Wither II. \n- Bat Swarm: Becomes invulnerable. \n- Dark Dominion: Steals health from all around her.

pages.title: Rewards
pages.text: - Lilith’s Soul \n- Lilith’s Contract \n- Crimson Fang (Weapon)
